gainPoints

The user gains points by doing an activity.

Parameters:

refresh - if the GUI should refresh.

gainPoints

public void gainPoints(PointEnums.Activity activity)
The user gains points. The GUI will refresh.

Parameters:
activity - the activity that the user did to gain those points.

updatePreferredFont

public void updatePreferredFont(java.lang.String fontName,
                                int fontSize)
A wrapper around FontManager.updatePreferredFont() that works better. Updates the PREFERRED_FONT to the given parameters. You should only pass one. NOTE: you have to validate the frame after this

Parameters:
fontName - the new font name/family. pass null if you don't want to change it.
fontSize - the new size of the font. pass 0 if you don't want to change it.

setActiveProject

public void setActiveProject(java.lang.String projectName,
                             boolean shouldSave)
Differs from setActive project in that that just changes active project, this handles user interaction

Parameters:
projectName - the name of the project you wish to be made active
shouldSave - whether or not user data should be saved

setNoActiveProject

Parameters:

shouldSave - true if the userData should be saved, false otherwise
Returns:
the created project

createProjectFromExistingFile

public void createProjectFromExistingFile(java.lang.String projectName,
                                          java.io.File projectFolder)
Creates a project assuming you have all the files (i.e. you've just imported it.)

Parameters:
projectName - the name of the project
projectFolder - the path to the project's folder (inside the Project Folder)
